p: Small mammals and their associated fleas were collected from 40 homesteads situated within the 10 trap sites described above. Timing of the five collections coincided primarily with the rainy seasons. Collections were conducted in Februaryâ€“March 2010 and 2011, which mark the end of the dry season and the start of the secondary rainy season, and October 2010 and November 2010, which represents the peak of the primary rainy season, and April 2011, which falls in the middle of the secondary rain season.
